## blockRendering.MarkerSvg.draw() method

Update the marker.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
draw(oldNode: ASTNode, curNode: ASTNode): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  oldNode | [ASTNode](./blockly.astnode.md) | The previous node the marker was on or null. |
|  curNode | [ASTNode](./blockly.astnode.md) | The node that we want to draw the marker for. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
